title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When using the Navigator, selecting a file and choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' does not open a new editor on the file if it is already open with a different type of editor.
EB: Selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for a file that is already open with a different type of editor should open a new editor on the file.
SR:
1. Open a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml' in the project.
3. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'.
4. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
5. Verify that a new editor opens for the file, instead of reactivating the current editor.

Additional Notes: The scripted resource editor example should open on XML files by default, but it ignores the XML file content. Searching for an existing open file should also consider editor types.
